mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mease, James, 1771-1846
mdRecord.dcterms:description: After presenting him with copy of his dissertation and returning it from New York, found his favour waiting; thanks him for it; discussed efficacy of mercury in diseases; may enlarge on subject in second edition of his book.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1792 June 16, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania], to Thomas Jefferson, High Street, [Philadelphia, Pennsylvania].
